## encrypt() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Encrypt a plain password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @virtual */
export default function encrypt(password: string): Promise<string>
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description    |
| --------- | ------ | -------------- |
| password  | string | plain password |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

Promise<string>, Returns a Promise with version hashed of the given password.

## Remarks

The `draw` member implements the main rendering for a widget.
